articles.title: Praggnanandhaa Wins 2022 Reykjavik Open - Chess.com
articles.description: GM Praggnanandhaa R. scored one of his career's best achievements so far by winning the 2022 Kvika Reykjavik Open in Iceland on Tuesday. The only 16-year-old Indian grandmaster won a crucial and dramatic game against his compatriot GM Gukesh D. (15) in the fi…

articles.title: Ashwin on retiring out: 'We're late, but this will happen a lot' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He believes T20 hasn't been "fully cracked yet" and retiring out "won't be a stigma like running someone out at the non-striker's end"
